Description: The iconic beacon in the Farrer Park district, One Farrer Hotel is located in the middle of a rich heritage and cultural enclave, set amidst new and dynamic developments of the future. A luxury retreat designed for the discerning traveller, this five-star urban resort offers an intuitive approach towards lifestyle and hospitality, with unique and distinct accommodation, F&B, conference and spa offerings. One Farrer Hotel offers 237 well-appointed rooms within a 'Hotels within a Hotel' concept, comprising of three distinct hotels - Urban Hotel, Loft Apartments and Skyline Hotel & Sky Villas. With Farrer Park MRT station right at its doorstep, the Central Business District, places of interest and the city's main shopping belt are just minutes away. A member of Preferred Hotel & Resorts, One Farrer Hotel lays the foundations of the modern Farrer Park.

Description: Sitting in the heart of the central business district and Marina Bay, with panoramic views of the Singapore city skyline, the 583-room PARKROYAL COLLECTION Marina Bay, Singapore is the country’s first ‘Garden-in-a-Hotel’. An champion of sustainability, environmental responsibility and advocate for green innovations in the hospitality industry, the hotel is home to Southeast Asia’s largest indoor sky-lit atrium, containing over 2,400 plants, trees, shrubs and groundcovers from more than 60 varieties of flora spread across 15,000 square feet of space throughout. Distinctive dining options are available for every palate and occasion, from international and Asian culinary creations at Peppermint, progressive Cantonese cuisine at Peach Blossoms, a selection of over 90 varieties of whiskies and craft cocktails at Portman’s Bar, and alfresco dining at Skyline Bar. A rooftop Urban Farm spanning 150 square metres houses over 60 varieties of fruits, vegetables, herbs and edible flowers, forming the backbone of the hotel’s farm-to-table, farm-to-bar and farm-to-spa concepts. The 25-metre swimming pool comes alive with 1,380 glowing fibre optic lights at dusk, and a refreshing dip in the pool articulates an experience not unlike the sensation of floating amongst a star-studded galaxy. Catering to environmentally conscious travellers, the hotel focuses on stylish contemporary vibes brought to life through biophilic design, iconic architecture, eco-friendliness and lifestyle experiences.

Description: Within a two-minute walk from Tanjong Pagar MRT station, Carlton City Hotel Singapore is conveniently located on Gopeng Street off Tanjong Pagar Road, along the fringes of Chinatown, Raffles Place and within the Central Business District. The hotel offers guests an upscale and stylish experience, resonating well with international business and leisure travellers. Designed by reputed leading international interior design company Hirsch Bedner Associates (HBA), the hotel exudes designer-conceived touches and furnishings from the grand marble lobby to its spacious guestrooms. With 29 floors and 386 guestrooms, the hotel is primed to be the preferred hotel for discerning business and leisure travellers.

Enjoy close proximity to key cultural, shopping and entertainment attractions. Make the most of our facilities, from St. Gregory Spa to our fitness centre and outdoor infinity pool – all conveniently located on the same floor.

Description: YOTEL's new Singapore hotel located on ultra-prime Orchard Road features 610 state-of-the-art cabins. Inspired by first class airline travel, the design for YOTEL in Singapore will remain true to the original concept and vision. Our rooms or ‘cabins’ as we like to call them are uncompromisingly designed around guests to give them a bigger experience in a smaller space, taking the essential elements of luxury hotels in smaller, smart spaces. The intelligent use of space means guests can enjoy perfectly designed cabins to relax, refresh, connect and sleep. Standard features include luxury bedding, rejuvenating rain showers, relaxing purple mood lighting , YOTEL’s ‘techno wall’ with flat screen TV, multi power points and ‘BYOD’ (Bring Your Own Device) connectivity. Conveniently located on Orchard Road, Asia’s most famous shopping street, guests can enjoy world class shopping at their doorsteps, with numerous restaurants, cafés and nightclubs.

Description: Conveniently located next to Singapore’s most vibrant entertainment hub, Clarke Quay, Boat Quay, Robertson Quay and Chinatown, Park Regis Singapore is within easy access to major tourist attractions as well as the Central Business District. A fully Wi-Fi enabled hotel, featuring 202 modernly designed open-concept guestrooms enhanced with upgraded bedding amenities, pillarless meeting room, well-equipped gym and an impressive 25-metre swimming pool with cascading waterfall. The hotel provides all the facilities that you need to complete your stay experience such as self-service laundromat. Park Regis Singapore is an ideal destination to meet, stay and unwind.

Description: Located in the charming enclave of the Novena district, Oasia Hotel Novena, Singapore is a premier business hotel that offers distinctively elegant accommodations in its 428 guestrooms. Perfect for unwinding or having high-powered business meetings, Oasia's award-winning Club Lounge - The Living Room and its private pool provide Club guests with absolute exclusivity. There is direct basement access to the Novena MRT Station which allows convenient travel to Orchard Road and the Central Business District. Each of the hotel's guestrooms is contemporary furnished with sleek, Asian-inspired designer fittings. Guests at Oasia Hotel Novena also enjoy complimentary WiFi, coffee/tea making facilities and a rain shower in the bathroom with invigorating bath amenities. Facilities include a 24-hour fitness centre, pool and The Marmalade Pantry - a restaurant that is popular for its modern bistro cuisine.

Description: Strategically located in the heart of the Civic District, Carlton Hotel Singapore offers 940 elegantly designed and spacious rooms and suites spread across the Main Tower, Executive Wing and Premier Wing. The hotel provides cosmopolitan amenities such as the Executive Club Lounge, a swimming pool, a gym as well as 13 outstanding functions rooms, creating a seamless and enjoyable stay for our guests. Delight your taste buds with the finest cuisines at Café Mosaic and our award-winning Wah Lok Cantonese Restaurant. Relax at Tuxedo Café & Pâtisserie with a cup of freshly brewed coffee and handcrafted pastries. Every part of the hotel experience is crafted to celebrate modern Singapore and is dedicated to the comfort of our guests.

Description: Located in the heart of Singapore's bustling Central Business District, within walking distance of the city’s tourist and commercial highlights including the heritage precinct, Chinatown, Amara Singapore is the brand’s flagship hotel. The hotel offers 384 well-appointed rooms and suites perfect for both leisure and business travellers with facilities including a Balinese style pool, 24-hour gym and a wellness spa. Amara Singapore is also just steps away from Michelin-starred restaurants, award winning bars, boutique alleyway cafes, street hawkers and a vibrant shopping district.

Description: Located at the gateway of Sentosa – Singapore’s premier island resort getaway, home to an exciting array of themed attractions – and opposite Vivocity, Singapore’s largest shopping mall, Travelodge Harbourfront is in the perfect location for savvy travellers looking to maximise their stay in sunny Singapore. Less than 15 minutes by car to the Mapletree Business City, a fast-growing integrated business hub, and with public transport options right at its doorstep, Travelodge Harbourfront is the ideal hotel for both leisure and business travellers. This hotel marks the launch of Travelodge into Singapore, the 5th most visited city in the world – a fantastic location for the rapidly growing Travelodge brand.

Description: An ASEAN Green Hotel and BCA Green Mark Platinum Award (Existing Buildings) winner, Furama City Centre is centrally located in Chinatown, in the Central Business District (CBD) and at the fringe of Shenton Way. This exquisite 445-room business hotel is equipped with wireless broadband connection and function rooms that can seat up to 750 guests. With a range of accommodation choices, guests are assured of a comfortable stay with its 24-hour room service, an in-house F&B outlet - Tiffany Cafe & Restaurant – that serves food from a Malay kitchen, and a Lobby Lounge with an extensive wine and snacks list. Retail, dining, attractions and entertainment are easily accessible within walking distance. Chinatown MRT station is a short 5-minute walk via a sheltered link bridge, whilst the Singapore Changi Airport is a mere 20-minute drive away.

Description: Nostalgia Hotel Singapore is a charming and elegant boutique hotel conveniently located in the heart of Singapore’s oldest estate Tiong Bahru .With its rich history ,traditional architectural design and its Urban Redevelopment Authority Conservation Status , it transports guests back in time to the colonial era of the city . From the bustling streets to its stylish rooms , Nostalgia Hotel Singapore is a perfect blend of comfort and sophistication.The hotel is well connected to all parts of Singapore and it’s myriad of attractions by 3 MRT stations within walking distance . The 3 MRT stations namely TEL Havelock , EWL Tiong Bahru and NEL Outram Park will bring you to the doorsteps of Singapore’s well known places of interest like orchard Road , Marina Bay sands, Gardens By The Bay and even Sentosa within minutes.Guests can take a stroll through the historic district surrounding the hotel , enjoy a delicious meal at the nearby restaurants or relax by the pool.Whether you are a traveller  looking for a hideaway escape or a local resident seeking a staycation , Nostalgia Hotel Singapore is the perfect destination in its own right .Attribute to that “Old World Charm – New World Luxe” , there is nothing more welcoming than Nostalgia Hotel’s ‘’ home away from home ‘’ feel when you are on the road.

Description: Village Hotel Changi offers a breath of fresh air from the other hotels in urban Singapore. The hotel is near the relatively untouched island of Pulau Ubin and the flora and fauna of the Chek Jawa Wetlands, which are both a bumboat ride away from Changi Ferry Terminal. Alternatively, guests can enjoy a leisurely stroll and enjoy the scenic Changi coastline. Located just 25 minutes away from Changi International Airport and 30-minute car ride from the Orchard shopping district, Village Hotel Changi is immensely popular with business travellers attending trade shows at the Singapore Expo, which is just 15 minutes away. With its proximity to the airport, the hotel is also a hot favourite with transit passengers who have a one or two-day stopover in our island nation.Village Hotel Changi's 380 rooms and 17 indoor and outdoor function venues make it ideal for both leisure and business travellers, with overseas meetings from foreign corporations, corporate retreats and team building sessions from local multinational corporations, weddings and solemnisations commonly held at the hotel.

Park Avenue Changi showcases 251 chic business hotel rooms and serviced suites. Feel a sense of intimacy with contemporary, modern and stylish furnishings that tastefully embrace the room. With a state-of-the-art gymnasium and swimming pool within the hotel, Park Avenue Changi has just about everything that keeps you pampered and occupied.Strategically situated within an integrated development with.Office, retail and convention spaces, Park Avenue Changi offers each and every business and leisure traveller the perfect place to stay. Enjoy complete accessibility at Park Avenue Changi; few minutes' walk to Singapore Expo & Expo MRT Station, and just 15 minutes drive to town (PIE and ECP Expressway) or Changi Airport.

Description: Aerotel Singapore is located in Changi Airport, AIRSIDE, Terminal 1, Departure Transit area and access is via escalator near departure Gate D40. The hotel offers hourly accommodations (minimum 6-hour block charge applies) and boasts having the only AIRSIDE hotel outdoor swimming pool worldwide, a pool side bar, an exercise corner and a library lounge exclusively for registered guests.IMPORTANT NOTICE :As the property is located AIRSIDE, in the Restricted/Transit area, Transit travellers must NOT clear immigration/customs (on transit means those who are travelling to another country via Singapore, without clearing Singapore arrival immigration). If you clear immigration/customs, airport immigration will not allow you to re-enter the transit area until your airline counter opens before departure. Arriving passengers planning to stay in the city are not allowed to stay in Aerotel.Departing passengers from city to note that most airline counters open only 3 hrs before departure. As such, you are not allowed access into the Transit area earlier, unless early check-in is available with your airline.If in doubt on arrival, please approach our 24-hour front desk for advise about luggage collection, onward boarding pass or about re-entering the transit area.

Description: Dusit Thani Laguna Singapore is located within the grounds of the acclaimed Laguna National Golf Resort Club, 10 minutes by car from Singapore Changi Airport and 15 minutes from Downtown. Comprising 198 tastefully decorated rooms and suites showcasing the best of contemporary Asian design, this resort is equipped for business and leisure with a wealth of experiences for guests to enjoy. Facilities include Greenhouse, an all-day dining multi-ethnic restaurant with 5 show kitchens, The Nest restaurant (for golfers and members only), Legends Bar, Tee Deck (Al fresco bar & grill), Dusit Gourmet (for deliveries and takeaways), DFiT (fully-equipped gym), three swimming pools, three tennis courts, Laguna Putting (powered by Nicklaus Design), Laguna Practice (powered by TopTracer) and Dusit’s signature Devarana Wellness. The resort also offers a boardroom, two meeting rooms, three event lawns, eight pavilions, a terrace for private functions, and a large pillarless ballroom (seats up to 520 guests) with a pre-function area overlooking the golf course. Guests will enjoy privileged access to the driving range and Laguna National’s championship Classic and Masters golf courses.

Description: Located in the heart of the vibrant Marina Bay, the Pan Pacific Singapore is a five-star hotel offering 790 contemporary rooms and suites that are ideal for business or leisure, with easy access to shopping malls, the Central Business District and just a 20-minute drive from Changi Airport. Guests can luxuriate in a perfect blend of comfort and elegance in the stylish rooms and suites that evoke the warmth and tranquillity of the Pacific, backed by sweeping panoramas of Marina Bay or the city skyline. For an enhanced stay, experience the exclusive Pacific Club, the hotel’s premium category of rooms located on the higher floors as well as suites, along with privileges such as access to the Pacific Club Lounge perched on the top floor offering unparalleled views of the city and the South China Sea, where Pacific Club guests are served Champagne breakfast, afternoon tea and sunset cocktails with canapés. The hotel offers a superlative range of event facilities comprising 25 meeting rooms, including a refurbished ballroom that seats up to 650 guests and spacious function rooms with natural daylight, incorporating the latest technology, supported by a dedicated team of Catering and Event Management professionals. Diversity is at the heart of Pan Pacific Singapore’s culinary journey, with a choice of award-winning restaurants and a gourmet marketplace. Choose from authentic local and regional cuisine at Edge buffet restaurant, Japanese fine dining at Keyaki, the exquisite Cantonese cuisine at Hai Tien Lo or Asian delights and gourmet homemade sausages at Pacific Marketplace. Other facilities include a 24-hour fitness centre to help workout buffs keep to their routine, whilst the St Gregory Spa provides a getaway from the hustle and bustle with a wide range of face and body treatments as well as traditional healing therapies. In addition, an outdoor pool, poolside bar and terrace looking out to the city are perfect for leisurely swims and sunbaths. To elevate the stay experience for families, children staying in the Pan Pacific Singapore will be guaranteed a whale of a time in the Urban Jungle Village, an indoor kids’ playground located on level four of the hotel. The wonderland offers seven activity zones integrating thinking, learning and playing. With an excellent location, elegant rooms and suites, versatile event venues, wide diversity of wine and dine options and well-appointed facilities converging in a single location, Pan Pacific Singapore is truly the ideal destination for urban living.

Description: Stay assured with an IHG Clean Promise and an award-winning green hotel in Singapore's central dining and entertainment hub. Standing in a strategic location at Clarke Quay, Holiday Inn Express Singapore Clarke Quay is minutes away from the Singapore River, Robertson Quay and the Central Business District. Just a seven-minute walk from Clarke Quay MRT Station, travel with ease to all of Singapore's major attractions, including Marina Bay Sands, Gardens by the Bay, Chinatown, Formula One Singapore and more. Enjoy spectacular city views from our widely raved 40-metre rooftop swimming pool, complete with whirlpools. Stay in comfort in our 442 stylishly designed modern rooms with floor-to-ceiling windows. Start your day right with our Express Start Breakfast or Grab & Go option and stay connected with Wi-Fi access throughout the hotel. Recharge throughout the day with refreshing beverages in the Great Room Bar.

Description: See why so many travelers make Hotel 81 Dickson their hotel of choice when visiting Singapore. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a quiet setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.Rooms at Hotel 81 Dickson offer a flat screen TV and air conditioning providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.A 24 hour front desk, baggage storage, and shops are some of the conveniences offered at this hotel. If you are driving to Hotel 81 Dickson, parking is available.Close to some of Singapore's most popular landmarks, such as Kuan Yin Thong Hood Cho Temple (0.3 mi) and Marina Bay Sands Skypark (1.5 mi), Hotel 81 Dickson is a great destination for tourists.While visiting Singapore, you may want to try some crab at one of the nearby restaurants, such as CE LA VI Restaurant, Palm Beach Seafood Restaurant, or JUMBO Seafood.Looking to explore? Then look no further than Orchard Road (1.1 mi), Singapore Flyer (1.2 mi), and Haji Lane (0.4 mi), which are some popular Singapore attractions – all conveniently located within walking distance of the hotel.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Hotel 81 Dickson as you experience all of the things Singapore has to offer.

Description: Naumi Hotel Singapore is an intimate retreat in Singapore that presents a selection of 73 elegantly-appointed rooms to cocoon guests in comfort. Find refuge and resplendence in Naumi Hotel Singapore with a huge selection of handpicked original design pieces from B&B Italia, Poltrona Frau, Zanotta, Tom Dixon, Artemide, alongside an impressive collection of some specially commissioned Singaporean art. With an international design pulse that is both attractive and architecturally appealing, Naumi is the trendsetter. Set in the heart of the Singapore’s Central Business District, Naumi Hotel Singapore is a state-of-the-art boutique hotel located a stone’s throw away from the Suntec Convention Centre, the Formula One Track, and a myriad of inner-city shopping centres.

Description: Studio M Hotel is Singapore's first fully loft-inspired designer hotel. It means that we're big on style, and understand that it's kind of cool to stay in a space that feels like a contemporary stylish urban living. Whether you're travelling for work, leisure or a bit of good-old self-discovery, you can do so in style in a hotel that was once lauded as AsiaOne People's Choice Award for best Boutique Hotel. Designed by Italian style maestro and architect, Piero Lissoni, Studio M Hotel Singapore offers contemporary living spaces in which one can work, rest and play.

Description: D’Resort @ Downtown East is a nature-inspired resort nestled in the lush greenery of Pasir Ris Park. The 387-room D’Resort provides guests with a quiet yet contemporary staycation away from hectic city life. D’Resort offers a total of 9 room types which cater to different needs and demographics. There are rooms for every budget and occasion, comprising resort units and suites, of which many offer unique park, mangrove and beach views. Coupled with an array of retail, dining and entertainment facilities in Downtown East, D’Resort is the perfect destination getaway that offers guests a wide array of exciting leisure facilities and amenities.

Description: Village Hotel Katong, as its name suggests, brings with it the Nonya flavors of Singapore's Eastern regions of Katong and Marine Parade. This non-smoking 229-room hotel, which features Superior, Deluxe, Club, and Family room categories, provides great value for travellers. All rooms come with an opening balcony, and range in size from 28m2 to 45m2. Village Hotel Katong draws its inspiration from the Peranakan heritage of its surrounding, which can be reflected in the hotel's Straits Chinese design accents. Village Hotel Katong is one of the few hotels which are located near Changi International Airport, and is just opposite Parkway Parade, one of the biggest shopping centres in the East of Singapore.

Description: Where heritage meets modernity. Located conveniently above the transport hub of Outram Park MRT interchange station, Dorsett Singapore offers easy accessibility to the city’s commercial and tourist highlights such as the shopping paradise at Orchard Road and Marina Bay; entertainment empires like the Resorts World Sentosa and Universal Studios Singapore, and the financial hub in Central Business District. All modern guestrooms and loft rooms equipped with full amenities and are equipped with high-speed internet access. The hotel offers a variety of facilities including meeting spaces, a fitness centre and an outdoor swimming pool with Jacuzzi. On-site dining and neighbouring eateries provide guests exclusive lifestyle privileges.

Description: Designed to meet the lifestyle needs of the digital generation, Capri by Fraser is a hotel residence that empowers its residents with a menu of intelligent services to choose the way they want to rest, relax and recharge. Urban inspired, high-tech and intuitive, Capri by Fraser's "always on" e-efficiency includes iPad-activated check-ins, interactive e-concierge, interactive walls, a Data Box and high-speed WIFI internet access. Its spacious studios, a total of 313, complete with fully equipped kitchenettes, allow more freedom of space than that of the average room. The option to cook any time of the day and play Kinect for Xbox 360 while doing the laundry provides a refreshing alternative to that of typical hotels.

Description: Surrounded by 4 hectares of lush natural greenery, Changi Cove Singapore offers a quiet retreat away from the city. Accentuating simplicity, and comfort, our modern rooms are suitable for guests looking to take a break from the city. All rooms are air-conditioned and include free Wi-Fi and a feature wall for guests where guests can doodle on. We are situated a 3 minutes walk away from Changi Boardwalk, a 20mins coastal walk to Changi Village Food Centre, and just about 15mins drive away from Changi International Airport!

Description: Champion Hotel, a trendy and cozy boutique hotel nestled charmingly along the famous Joo Chiat Road. Known for its rich multicultural heritage and vibrance. The 80 newly renovated and refurbished guest rooms are housed in a 4-storey conservation building. The guest rooms are spaciously designed and warmly decorated to ensure you a comfortable and pleasant stay. It is easily accessible via public transports and approximately 15-20 minutes taxi ride from Changi International Airport. A wide range of eateries are available for you to choose from within close vicinity to satisfy your gastronomic cravings day and night and also not forgetting the interesting tourist attractions around. Champion Hotel is an ideal choice for all travellers.

Description: The Pod Boutique Capsule Hotel located @ Beach Road is Singapore's leading boutique capsule hotel catering to discerning travellers who desire fuss-free and convenient living. With over 100 cosy capsules and suites inspired by modern and minimalistic living, you can look forward to convenience at your fingertips without compromising on comfort, quality or style. At The Pod Boutique Capsule Hotel, personalised concierge services are on hand to satisfy your every need so that you can focus on the things that truly matter. Enjoy complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi access, all-day coffee & tea and more with a complete set of amenities ensures effortless living right at the centre of Singapore. Located at the fringe of the Singapore Central Business District, The Pod Boutique Capsule Hotel offers quick accessibility to the heart of the financial centre or immersion in the warmth of bustling Haji Lane - rated as one of the top shopping places in Singapore.

Description: Summer View Hotel is centrally situated just 300 metres from Rochor MRT Station. Boasting an accessible location, the cosy hotel offers a restaurant and free WiFi. Hotel Summer View is a 20-minute drive from Changi International Airport. The hotel is located next to Sim Lim Square and a 10-minute drive from popular Orchard Road. Rooms at Summer View have modern designs with a touch of home. Fully air-conditioned, rooms have a fridge, satellite TV and tea/coffee making facilities. En suite bathrooms feature a standing shower. The hotel provides a postal service and a 24-hour currency exchange service.

Description: First opened in 1968 and then closed for re-development in 2012, Hotel Grand Central reopened on 21st October 2015 with 263 brand new rooms. The Hotel is located on the Orchard Road shopping belt and centered between two major Mass Transit Stations, the Dhoby Ghaut and Somerset Stations. The hotel has a total of 8 floors of which 2 floors comprise Executive Rooms and the remaining being Deluxe rooms. Each room is filled with large 42-inch LED TV, dedicated WIFI connection and luxurious American beds. An environment friendly in-room filtered water dispenser that dispenses chill, room temperature or hot water is fitted to provide greater convenience for our guests.

Description: Novotel Singapore on Stevens is about 5 minutes from Orchard Road, Asia's famous entertainment and shopping belt. Explore Singapore with convenient public transport, including a bus stop right at the hotel doorstep and Stevens MRT and Orchard MRT subway stations close by. Unlock your Singapore adventures by visiting Singapore Botanic Gardens, a UNESCO Heritage Site, as well as cultural districts of Chinatown and Little India. Novotel Singapore on Stevens is part of a lush urban paradise equipped with facilities such as an infinity pool, lap pool, tennis court, 24-hour gym, 6 meeting spaces, 3 ballrooms and 14 dining outlets. Relax and make the most of your stay in our modern and contemporary Novotel rooms. Enjoy full-service comfort and serenity set amongst lush greenery alongside high-speed Wi-Fi, web TV, and eco-friendly shower amenities. Plunge into bed and be assured of a comfortable and relaxing night’s sleep in our high-quality plush bedding.

Description: Stay at the World's Best Airport Hotel in Singapore Changi Airport and discover Jewel.Step off your flight into the resort ambience of Crowne Plaza Changi Airport, located at Terminal 3 and seamlessly connected to all airport terminals and Jewel, a tropical wonderland where nature meets retail, next to the hotel. Simply take a sky train or link bridge from your terminal directly to our doorstep. The hotel has won the World's Best Airport Hotel in the 2023 Skytrax World Airport Awards for 8 consecutive years as well as numerous local and international awards.Hold your conference, business meeting or event in our rainforest-inspired ballroom or any of our five nature-inspired function rooms. All are equipped with the latest technology and complimentary Wi-Fi. If work takes you away from the hotel, take a taxi southwest to Changi Business Park or Singapore Expo in 10 minutes. A 25-minute taxi or MRT ride takes you downtown to the city.

Description: Conveniently located in the heart of Singapore, Swissôtel The Stamford is a 5-star hotel that boasts a prime Singapore location amid the diversions of the Raffles City shopping complex and just 20 minutes away from Singapore Changi International Airport. One of Southeast Asia's tallest hotels, Swissôtel The Stamford offers a luxurious range of 1,252 guestrooms and suites with a wealth of amenities and panoramic views of Singapore and Malaysia. It also boasts an impressive array of restaurants and bars including the 2 Michelin-starred JAAN by Kirk Westaway. The hotel also houses the 108,000 sq. ft. Raffles City Convention Center which comprises 34 meeting venues with technologically advanced business facilities and services.

Description: Located in the Arab Street and Kampong Glam enclave, and a mere stone’s throw away from Bugis Village and Little India, Village Hotel Bugis is at the crossroads of Singapore’s Arab, Peranakan and Indian enclaves.These multicultural and multinational influences are seen in the Indian, Chinese and international cuisines at the hotel’s three dining options.Guests can explore the side streets of Kampong Glam, Bugis Village and Haji Lane, which have small boutique outlets stocked with fashion labels otherwise not found in the Singapore malls. They can also indulge in a shopping spree at the Bugis Junction and Bugis+ shopping centres. The Bugis MRT station, which is just a 5-minute walk away, connects guests to the Orchard shopping belt or the Central Business Districts of City Hall or Raffles City.Besides its location, Village Hotel Bugis' key selling point is its spacious rooms, which start from 32sqm for its entry level Superior Room to up to a generous 64sqm for its Executive Club Suite.

Description: Hilton Singapore Orchard is an inspiring landmark hotel for the brand in Singapore and the region. Set in the heart of Singapore's Orchard Road's shopping and entertainment district, it is the largest Hilton hotel in Asia Pacific. Restaurants and medical centres are nearby; two subway stations are within walking distance, with connections to Marina Bay; and Changi Airport is 25 minutes away. This extensively renovated hotel offers 1,080 rooms and suites and five innovative dining options which are award-winning, MICHELIN-starred, and helmed by celebrity chefs. The hotel also has 2,438 square metres of 16 versatile and flexible event spaces that are ideal for any occasions from large-sized MICE events to mid-sized business seminars, weddings and social celebrations. Hilton Singapore Orchard also offers two 24-hour fully equipped fitness centres, an outdoor pool and an immediate proximity to a spot of retail indulgence with the hotel directly connected to a four-storey high shopping gallery of luxury fashion boutiques, restaurants, and lifestyle and entertainment stores.

Description: Situated at just 22 kilometres (12 miles) away from Changi International Airport, the 30-story Grand Copthorne Waterfront Hotel is located along the Singapore waterfront near Boat Quay, Clarke Quay and Robertson Quay. Easily accessible by taxi to various business and entertainment districts, such as Raffles Place, the Marina Bay Financial Centre, Orchard Road, Chinatown, Sentosa and Universal Studios, the hotel presents itself as the ideal place to stay and explore Singapore. The new Havelock MRT station is located just 2 minutes' away, right across Grand Copthorne Waterfront, making it super convenient & easy to zip around the city.

Description: Housed in a heritage 1920s Art Deco style building, Wanderlust merges old world charm with modern day comforts. Located on the fringe of Singaporeʼs main commercial and business districts, guests are close to everything while remaining delightfully off the beaten track, right by the hipster enclave of Jalan Besar. Conscientiously designed for the modern traveller, the propertyʼs curated spaces and flexible concept offering personable and unique experiences to cater to every jaunt and journey. Along with convenient access to Changi Airport, the central business district as well as a multitude of local attractions, the Wanderlust's 29 rooms offer travellers an oasis of calm to return to after their adventures around the city.

Description: Looking for a place to stay in Singapore? Then look no further than Strand Hotel, a family-friendly hotel that brings the best of Singapore to your doorstep.As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer a flat screen TV, a refrigerator, and air conditioning, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.Guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, room service, and a concierge while staying at Strand Hotel Singapore. In addition, Strand Hotel offers free breakfast, which will help make your Singapore trip additionally gratifying. And, as an added convenience, there is parking available to guests.For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Singapore, Strand Hotel Singapore is located a short distance from Little India (0.5 mi) and Marina Bay Sands Skypark (1.3 mi).If you’re looking for an Italian restaurant, consider a visit to The Lighthouse Restaurant & Rooftop Bar, No Menu, or Beach Road Kitchen, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Strand Hotel Singapore.Plus, during your trip, don’t forget to check out some of the popular monuments and statues, such as Merlion Park, Civilian War Memorial, and Statue of Raffles.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Strand Hotel as you experience everything Singapore has to offer.

Description: If you’re looking for a quiet small hotel in Singapore, look no further than J8 Hotel.Nearby landmarks such as Singapore Flyer (1.3 mi) and Orchard Road (1.5 mi) make J8 Hotel a great place to stay when visiting Singapore.Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at J8 Hotel offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar.During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a 24 hour front desk, 24 hour check-in, and baggage storage. Guests of J8 Hotel are also welcome to enjoy free breakfast, located on site. For travelers arriving by car, parking is available.Travelers looking to enjoy some dumplings  can head to Lau Pa Sat, Summer Pavilion, or Chijmes Lei Garden Restaurant. Otherwise, you may want to check out an Italian restaurant such as Beach Road Kitchen, The Lighthouse Restaurant & Rooftop Bar, or No Menu.If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Haji Lane (0.5 mi), Arab Street (0.5 mi), or Little India (0.5 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance.The staff at J8 Hotel looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

Description: Owned and managed by YWCA of Singapore, YWCA Fort Canning is located beside Fort Canning Park, 275 m from Plaza Singapura. It features a swimming pool and air-conditioned non-smoking rooms with cable TV. Guests enjoy free parking. The Lodge is a 5-minute walk from the National Museum and 150 m from Dhoby Ghaut MRT Station. Changi International Airport is a 15-minute drive from the hotel. Most rooms offer views of the city, pool or park, and are equipped with a mini fridge and tea/coffee maker. Hot shower facilities and toiletries are provided in the en suite bathrooms. Guests can enjoy a stroll in the park opposite the lodge. Luggage storage facility is provided at the 24-hour front desk. The Coffee House serves a variety of local and Western dishes. A la carte menu options are also available. Dhoby Ghaut is a great choice for travellers interested in shopping, clean streets and convenient public transport. This is our guests' favourite part of Singapore, according to independent reviews

Description: Luxuriate in warm hospitality in the heart of the city at the new Grand Park City Hall. Conveniently located in a prime spot in Singapore’s Civic District and within the Central Business District, the hotel is a stone's throw from major shopping malls such as Raffles City and Capitol Piazza. Suntec City and the Marina Bay entertainment and business district are minutes away by car. Indulge in modern European cuisine and sip on artisanal cocktails at Tablescape Restaurant & Bar located on Level 3 of the hotel. Announcement: The hotel’s major transformation works have been completed.

Description: Housed in a restored colonial building located in the heart of Singapore’s Arts District, Rendezvous Hotel Singapore is inspired by its locale’s vibrant energy and character.As an art-inspired hotel, Rendezvous Hotel Singapore brings together stylish elements reminiscent of its heritage to complement modern masterpieces and create a unique aesthetic style. It is a brand that appreciates creativity and is proud to show it.Primed to be a meeting point where art and creative ideas grow, Rendezvous Hotel Singapore aspires to support the arts and culture through collaborations and initiatives with both students and artists from Singapore and around the world. This is Rendezvous Hotel Singapore, placing you at the art of it all.

Description: Welcome to Mercure Singapore On Stevens, your Singapore “home away from home.” Mercure Singapore On Stevens aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.While staying at Mercure Singapore On Stevens, visitors can check out Little India (1.7 mi) and Haji Lane (2.3 mi), some of Singapore's top attractions.Mercure Singapore On Stevens offers guests an array of room amenities including a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available.The hotel offers a 24 hour front desk, room service, and newspaper, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features a pool and an on-site restaurant. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking.When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out MTR Restaurant, Crossroads Cafe, and DC Comics Super Heroes Cafe, which are some cafes that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.Plus, during your trip, don’t forget to check out some of the popular art museums, such as National Gallery Singapore, Singapore Art Museum, and Indian Heritage Centre.Mercure Singapore On Stevens puts the best of Singapore at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

Description: The Fairmont Singapore hotel is ideally situated at the crossroads of Singapore's business, cultural, entertainment and shopping districts. It offers 778 luxurious guestrooms and suites, a collection of distinctive restaurants and bars and 108,000 square feet of prime meeting space - all supported by our Singapore hotel's award-winning service teams. In addition, guests of Fairmont Singapore have access to the Willow Stream Spa, one of the largest spa facilities in Asia, offering the best in spa and fitness services.

Description: Bliss Hotel Singapore is a modern Chinese-themed boutique hotel, with 42 elegantly-appointed rooms to cocoon you in maximum comfort. Our rooms are where contemporary chic meets thoughtful, compact design, and you will be surprised at its spaciousness. Our hotel is ideally designed to cater to both business & leisure travellers, with business centre services, laundry & dry cleaning, concierge & tour services, a 24 hour front desk, free WiFi, complimentary luggage storage and shower facilities. Whether you're a tourist or a business traveller, Bliss Hotel Singapore is a great choice for a truly memorable, highly convenient, and exquisitely delightful experience. The hotel has a focus on going green & is also a non-smoking property. Its perfect location and budget friendly prices, coupled with excellent customer service will give you a home away from home experience in a grand yet comfortable surrounding.

Description: An award-winning green hotel in the heart of Orchard Road, Holiday Inn Express Singapore Orchard Road is certified with SG Clean in its commitment to IHG Clean Promise. Description: Venue Hotel the Lily is a excellent choice for tourists and travelers who like to stay slightly away from the city centre to savour a taste of the Singaporean lifestyle. The hotel is priced very attractively although it is newly renovated, with most of the little indulgence one may not expect from a hotel in its priced category. All rooms are served with (complimentary) high speed wifi, with in room mini-fridge/safe etc. Just a few doors away, we have bakeries, local delicacies, Vietnamese restaurants, 24hrs convenient stores and supermarkets. The beach (East Coast Park) is just 10 mins by taxi, if the sun and sea could add to the joy of the stay. East Coast Park also offers seafood & other gourmet restaurants and other recreation activities (bicycle, roller blade rentals etc) Thus for a short relaxing holiday or an escape from the cold, Venue Hotel the Lily may just be your perfect hideout.

Description: Tai Hoe is a modern budget hotel that offers clean and cosy rooms at a central location. The 24 hour Mustafa shopping centre selling everything is just behind the hotel while the international City Square Mall is just in front. The MRT, bus stop, and taxis are easily accessible. Try the unbelievable varieties of food around the hotel. Air con, flat screen, and attached shower available in room. Everything on a budget.

Description: See why so many travelers make ibis budget Singapore Ruby (formerly known as Fragrance Hotel - Ruby) their hotel of choice when visiting Singapore. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a quiet setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you. You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and you can stay connected during your stay as ibis budget Singapore Ruby offers guests free wifi. The hotel features a 24 hour front desk, 24 hour check-in, and baggage storage. For guests with a vehicle, parking is available. Close to some of Singapore's most popular landmarks, such as Arab Street (1.7 mi) and Haji Lane (1.7 mi), ibis budget Singapore Ruby is a great destination for tourists. If you’re looking for an Asian restaurant, consider a visit to CE LA VI Restaurant, Palm Beach Seafood Restaurant, or JUMBO Seafood, which are all conveniently located a short distance from ibis budget Singapore Ruby. Looking to explore? Then look no further than National Stadium (0.9 mi), Singapore Indoor Stadium (0.7 mi), and Geylang Serai New Market (1.2 mi), which are some popular Singapore attractions – all conveniently located within walking distance of the hotel. We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at ibis budget Singapore Ruby as you experience all of the things Singapore has to offer.

Description: Looking for a place to stay in Singapore? Then look no further than Robertson Quay Hotel, a quiet hotel that brings the best of Singapore to your doorstep.Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Robertson Quay Hotel Singapore offer a flat screen TV and air conditioning.During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a 24 hour front desk, 24 hour check-in, and currency exchange. Guests of Robertson Quay Hotel are also welcome to enjoy a pool and breakfast, located on site. For travelers arriving by car, parking is available.While staying at Robertson Quay Hotel, visitors can check out Haji Lane (1.4 mi) and Marina Bay Sands Skypark (1.4 mi), some of Singapore's top attractions.Singapore has plenty of seafood restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like Palm Beach Seafood Restaurant, JUMBO Seafood, and Newton Food Centre, which are serving up some great dishes.Singapore is also home to Jeric Salon, a popular volcano that is not too far from Robertson Quay Hotel.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Robertson Quay Hotel as you experience everything Singapore has to offer.

Description: We are committed to high levels of cleanliness at Holiday Inn Express Singapore Serangoon by following  IHG Clean Promise  standards. The hotel is conveniently located on Jalan Besar in the heritage hub of Little India cultural district, a 20-minute drive from Singapore Changi Airport and just a short walk from Farrer Park and Bendemeer MRT Stations. The hotel offers easy access to all key business and leisure areas of Singapore, including Orchard, Bugis, Chinatown and Marina Bay, as well as, Suntec Convention Centre and National StadiumFeaturing 119 modern design rooms, Holiday Inn Express Singapore Serangoon is the smart choice for savvy travellers who are looking for the best location combined with the best value in Singapore Serangoon area, offering an affordable and hassle-free stay. Start the day right with our all-inclusive Express Start Breakfast with Grab & Go option and stay connected with our complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.

Description: Sheraton Towers Singapore is centrally located along Scotts Road in the heart of Singapore just a 10-minute walk from the Orchard Road shopping and entertainment district. The Newton Interchange train station next door linking the Downtown and North South Lines makes the hotel easily accessible to major attractions. Featuring 420 elegantly appointed rooms and 13,400 square feet of prime event space made up of 16 event venues, the Hotel is equipped with modern amenities and conveniences, including high-speed internet access and the fitness centre that overlooks the outdoor swimming pool. From the detailed elegant furnishings and delicate presentation of culinary experience, to warm, discreet service, the hotel believes in pampering its guests with the comfort, luxury and conveniences that they are accustomed to at home.

Description: Finding an ideal quiet hotel in Singapore does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Venue Hotel, a nice option for travelers like you.Rooms at Venue Hotel offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.A 24 hour front desk, baggage storage, and express check-in and check-out are some of the conveniences offered at this hotel. Description: Centrally located close to Central Business District and all major landmarks, the hotel offers guests a colorful stay in the heart of Little India, one of Singapore’s most vibrant enclaves. We are a short 6-minute walk from Little India MRT, a 25-minute drive from Singapore Changi Airport and an 8-minute drive from Central Business District and Suntec Convention & Exhibition Centre. Surrounding the hotel are historic sites, beautiful temples, shopping and entertainment. The Mustafa Centre is an 8-storey shopping mall open 24 hours, and the Tekka Centre is Singapore’s largest indoor wet market. Enjoy the casual Garden Grille’s hearty and healthy dishes, or indulge in the convenient evening room service. The 24-hour Pavilion Pantry™ offers drinks, instant meals and travel essentials. Relax under the sun in the sparkling outdoor pool, or work out in the 24-hour fitness centre. The 24-hour Business Centre offers complimentary printing services and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.

Description: Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Singapore, ibis budget Singapore Pearl (formerly known as Fragrance Hotel - Pearl) is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its budget friendly environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, ibis budget Singapore Pearl makes it easy to enjoy the best of Singapore. The rooms offer a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease. ibis budget Singapore Pearl features a 24 hour front desk and baggage storage. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking. Close to some of Singapore's most popular landmarks, such as Arab Street (1.5 mi) and Haji Lane (1.6 mi), ibis budget Singapore Pearl is a great destination for tourists. When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out SuperTree by IndoChine, Seven & Ate, and 13% Gastro Wine, which are some pubs that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike. Singapore is also home to Fort Canning Lighthouse, a popular lighthouse that is not too far from ibis budget Singapore Pearl. Whether you’re traveling for business, pleasure or both, ibis budget Singapore Pearl is sure to make your visit to Singapore one worth remembering.

Description: Welcome to Holiday Inn® Singapore Orchard City CentreSituated in the heart of Orchard Road, Singapore's premier business and shopping district, Holiday Inn® Singapore Orchard City Centre offer guests a great stay with our excellent services and strategic location.Relax in one of 324 guestrooms equipped with a unique selection of pillows, a 37-inch LCD TV and complimentary Wi-Fi. Experience authentic North Indian flavours at Tandoor, indulge in local Asian and seafood delights at Window on the Park, or relax with a cocktail at the Lobby Lounge & Bar. Kids stay and eat for free!The hotel is a stone's throw away from two subway stations, entertainment spots and renowned medical centres in the area. Located near famous cultural districts such as Chinatown and Little India, plus easy access to attractions like Gardens by the Bay and Universal Studios Singapore, we are ideal for travellers and staycations. Changi International Airport is just a 25-minute drive away.

Description: Santa Grand Hotel East Coast is built on a 2-storey conservation frontage backed by a 5-storey building. Guests will feel welcomed in the lobby, decorated in bright Peranakan colours, that comes with comfortable seating areas and a business center. Rooms come in four different designs, themes and colours that guests will feel the freshness and variety each time they stay with us. A roof top swimming pool and Jacuzzi offer guests a chance to relax in a tranquil environment with a bird's eye view of the low-lying housing architecture symbolic of the Joo Chiat heritage. Bright colours are used on design of the hotel, similar to the patented sophistication seen in the homes of the Peranakans, creating a warm and inviting ambience and leaving guests with fond memories of the stay.

Description: Discerning travellers will enjoy the hospitality and warmth of our 346 rooms and suites at PARKROYAL on Beach Road. Spacious yet intimate, this Singapore accommodation is perfect for relaxing after a busy day of getting to know the city. Take in the charming views of quaint shophouses and ethnic shophouses from your room. For your utmost comfort, you'll find a range of handy amenities for all your needs - enjoy the in-room entertainment, which includes cable channels and complimentary in-house movie channels, or share the best of your day with family and friends via high-speed broadband Internet access. Savour the best of authentic local delights at Ginger, with a choice of buffet or a la carte menu, and indulge in a gastronomic journey of Sichuan cuisine at Si Chuan Dou Hua Restaurant with a myriad of robust taste profiles. Swing by Club 5 and experience our cocktail program, inspired by the historically rich neighbourhood of Beach Road, Bugis Street and Arab Street! Let us pamper you whenever you stay in PARKROYAL's stylish hotel rooms in Singapore.

Description: I was more than happy with my 6 hours in the nap room... Bring earplugs and eye mask though! And be warned the aircon is very cool... I ended up sleeping fully dressed under the covers, but I may have been cold due to tiredness also?!? The bathroom and showers were good, with shampoo, body soap and body lotion provided. Also toothbrush, towel  and slippers in nap room. Lounge was quiet, nice seats, view of sunflower garden. Buffet food was plentiful, but hot meal/ dinner focused.... I was there at breakfast time in my body clock, so stuck to toast, muffins, cheese sandwich, tea, juice etc. Would happily stay again. Helped break up my 12 hours night stopover

Description: Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Singapore, Hotel 81 - Sakura is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its budget friendly environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Hotel 81 - Sakura makes it easy to enjoy the best of Singapore.Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.Hotel 81 - Sakura features a 24 hour front desk, baggage storage, and shops, to help make your stay more enjoyable.Close to some of Singapore's most popular landmarks, such as Singapore Indoor Stadium (1.9 mi) and National Stadium (2.0 mi), Hotel 81 - Sakura is a great destination for tourists.If you like pubs, Hotel 81 - Sakura is conveniently located near Breez Bistro.Bar, The Communal Place, and Burp Kitchen & Bar - Tanjong Katong.Should time allow, East Coast Park and Katong District are some popular attractions that are within walking distance.Whether you’re traveling for business, pleasure or both, Hotel 81 - Sakura is sure to make your visit to Singapore one worth remembering.

Description: Hotel Clover The Arts, situated in the heart of Chinatown, is a 44-room art-themed boutique hotel which builds on its conviction to create an arts experience through its individually-themed rooms. The result is a visual feast of creativity and a wide range of design aesthetics sure to excite even the most casual of art lovers. The highlight of the hotel is the individually-themed rooms. Designed in styles as diverse as retro kitsch, urban street art, Pop Art vibrance and line art minimalism, each room in the hotel creates its own distinctively unique experience, playfully blurring the line between sleeping and waking. Hotel Clover The Arts is part of the Hotel Clover chain owned by Singa Group of Companies.

Description: Finding an ideal hotel in Singapore does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Jayleen Clarke Quay Hotel, a nice option for travelers like you.For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Singapore, Jayleen Clarke Quay Hotel is located a short distance from Merlion Park (0.5 mi) and Little India (1.2 mi).Guest rooms offer air conditioning, a refrigerator, and a desk, and Jayleen Clarke Quay Hotel makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and baggage storage. In addition, guests can enjoy breakfast during their visit.Travelers looking to enjoy some hotpot can head to Wing Seong Fatty's (Albert) Restaurant, Hai Di Lao Hot Pot, or Hai Di Lao. Otherwise, you may want to check out a pub such as SuperTree by IndoChine, Oso Ristorante, or Black Nut.Singapore is also known for some great art museums, including National Gallery Singapore, Singapore Art Museum, and Indian Heritage Centre, which are not too far from Jayleen Clarke Quay Hotel.Jayleen Clarke Quay Hotel looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Singapore.

Description: Here at BEAT. Capsule Hostel, we reside over the iconic Singapore River. We love the tranquility in the day, where you can just gaze at the still waters, and pause in this busy Singapore city. At night, the entire Boat Quay/ Clarke Quay vicinity lights up with entertainment from bazaars, to music, to a wide variety of restaurants. Placed in the heart of the city, you are surrounded by Chinatown, Little India, Malay Kampong Glam, and Marina Bay. Enjoy the privacy of your own Capsule, the warmth of our staff (and guests), and take your time to experience the rest of Singapore... all in a BEAT.

Description: After a legacy of 36 years Mandarin Oriental, Singapore recently reimagined its spaces, design and signature service to deliver a truly unique hospitality experience that embodies what it means to be Exceptionally Singapore. This award-winning property in the heart of Marina Bay offers easy access to the city’s financial hub, luxury boutiques, and a host of iconic must-see sites. The hotel holds 510 luxuriously-appointed rooms and suites, meeting and banquet facilities, five restaurants including the award-winning MO BAR, The Spa at Mandarin Oriental, Singapore and the exclusive members lounge HAUS 6565. It is the only hotel in the city that has been awarded Five Star status for both accommodation and spa in the prestigious Forbes Travel Guide for 12 consecutive years (2012 to 2023).

Description: Hotel Clover 769 North Bridge Road is a 35-room boutique hotel located in the historical and hip Kampong Glam area. A vintage historical gem, it is housed in a trio of 2-storey conserved shophouses constructed between 1840 and 1960, formerly a tailor and a jewellery parlour, and wildly celebrated for its cultural and architectural heritage. The interiors is marked by a soothing palette of white, beige and brown and modern clean lines, forming the canvas for handcrafted wood furniture and curated array of retro decorative pieces.

Description: Located at the entrance of the Orchard Road, Singapore's most famous shopping belt, Orchard Rendezvous Hotel, Singapore (Formerly Orchard Parade Hotel) is just a 10-minute walk from Lido Cineplex and major shopping centers such as ION Orchard, Wisma Atria and Ngee Ann City. Business travellers will enjoy the accessibility of Orchard Rendezvous Hotel, Singapore, and families with children will definitely appreciate the hotel's spacious 50-60sqm Family Rooms. It is also within 10-minute walk to Scotts Road, another famous shopping district in Singapore. The same amount of walking time will bring you to Orchard MRT station, which can connect you to other parts of the city. A 10-minute car ride will get you to the Central Business District or Suntec Singapore International Convention & Exhibition Centre. Orchard Rendezvous Hotel, Singapore is also only 30-minute drive from Changi International Airport.

Description: Be yourself at Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality, where a private club experience awaits you.Quincy Hotel Singapore is a stroll away from fashionable Orchard Road. All stays include daily set breakfast from 7am to 3pm, 24-hour lounge access with light refreshments, and evening cocktail from 6pm to 8pm. As a Premier Room guest, you will get to choose 5 welcome minibar items upon check-in.Other recreational facilities include a 24-hour gym, 24-hour infinity pool, sauna and steam rooms. You'll live life to the fullest here, whether you're spending a few days or just a few hours.

Description: A jewel in Marina Bay with 512 fully refurbished guestrooms and suites, Conrad Centennial Singapore is one of the city’s most esteemed addresses for business and leisure travellers. Well connected, the hotel is a 20 minute drive from Changi International Airport and a 3 minute walk to the Promenade MRT station. Savour tantalising cuisines at our award-winning restaurants. From sumptuous International buffets at Oscar’s to exquisite Cantonese cuisine at Golden Peony, as well as indulgent afternoon tea and delicious cocktails at our opulent Lobby Lounge, you will be spoilt for choice. For those with a sweet tooth, dainty cakes with gourmet coffee and tea at The Terrace are not to be missed. The hotel is also located in close proximity to six shopping malls with over 1,000 shops and 400 restaurants; world-class attractions such as Gardens by the Bay, the Singapore Flyer, the National Gallery Singapore and museums.

Description: Rest Bugis Hotel, has a swimming pool, jacuzzi and café serving breakfast. Located on the fringes of the Little India District and a few hundred metres from the Malay Heritage Centre, this hotel makes the most of an area rich in history. Just down the road there are a few attractions such as Arab Street, Haji Lane & Bugis Street now featuring a teeming street market and collection of roadside stalls which is a must see for leisure or shopping guest visiting Singapore. Also, conveniently nearby are an Indian temple and one of Singapore's best known Buddhist Temples. Besides sightseeing, guest can visit Sim Lim Square, which is only 10-minutes stroll away and it houses Singapore's biggest collection of IT and computer stores. Completing the attractiveness of Rest Bugis Hotel is its accessibility to public transport such as taxis, buses, and Mass Rapid Transit (MRT- EW Line & DT Line) to various places in Singapore.

Description: If you’re looking for a budget friendly hotel in Singapore, look no further than ibis budget Singapore Crystal (formerly known as Fragrance Hotel - Crystal). Nearby landmarks such as Arab Street (1.6 mi) and Haji Lane (1.6 mi) make ibis budget Singapore Crystal a great place to stay when visiting Singapore. ibis budget Singapore Crystal offers guests an array of room amenities including a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available. The hotel offers a 24 hour front desk, 24 hour check-in, and baggage storage, to make your visit even more pleasant. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking. If you like Italian restaurants, ibis budget Singapore Crystal is conveniently located near The Lighthouse Restaurant & Rooftop Bar, LAVO Italian Restaurant & Rooftop Bar, and Beach Road Kitchen. Singapore is also known for some great art galleries, including Ode To Art, Degiosart, and The Arts House, which are not too far from ibis budget Singapore Crystal. The staff at ibis budget Singapore Crystal looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

Description: Directly connected to Bugis MRT station and situated at the crossroads of the Kampong Glam, Little India and Bras Basah Bugis cultural districts, with their intimate shophouse-filled alleyways and atmospheric colours, textures and flavours, Andaz Singapore aims to spark off a sense of discovery of the rich culture of Singapore, and inspire guests to experience the city through fresh perspectives. All guestrooms feature floor-to-ceiling windows that frame stunning views of Singapore’s skyline. In-room guests will enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi, and minibar with snacks and beverages. Choose from a variety of food and beverage options - Alley on 25 brings Singapore street dining to the sky by offering a multi-cuisine dining experience; 665°F is a steakhouse specialising in prime meats and sustainable seafood grilled in a Pira Oven; 5 ON 25 is a modern upscale restaurant featuring refined Cantonese cuisine; Bar Square, the hotel’s communal bar; and Mr Stork, a rooftop bar offering breath-taking 360-degree view of the city.

Description: With unique balcony rooms that provide the comfort and warmth of home, Copthorne King's Hotel Singapore is the best family hotel to stay near Robertson Quay offering impeccable hospitality. We offer a landscaped outdoor pool, steam and sauna facilities and a garden terrace with stunning city views where you can experience the resort life right in the city! Just 5 minutes away to Havelock MRT Station (TE16), Chinatown, the Orchard Road shopping belt, Robertson Quay and Clarke Quay nightlife and entertainment districts, Suntec Convention Centre and Marina Bay Financial Centre, we are a stone's throw away from old and new experiences!

Description: Welcome to Hotel 81-Bugis, your Singapore “home away from home.” Hotel 81-Bugis aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Little India (0.7 mi) and Merlion Park (0.7 mi), guests of Hotel 81-Bugis can easily experience some of Singapore's most well known attractions.The rooms offer a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.Hotel 81-Bugis features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and a convenience store. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to parking.While in Singapore be sure to experience local lobster favorites at CE LA VI Restaurant, Palm Beach Seafood Restaurant, or JUMBO Seafood.During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like Gardens by the Bay (1.2 mi), Marina Bay Sands Skypark (1.0 mi), and Orchard Road (1.2 mi), which are all within walking distance of the hotel.Hotel 81-Bugis puts the best of Singapore at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

Nestled in the upscale neighbourhood, Hotel Royal is centrally located with only 5 minutes drive away from the shopping and entertainment haven of Orchard Road. A short walk will bring you to 3 major shopping centres and Novena MRT Station. Newton Food Centre is about 800m away from Hotel Royal where one can enjoy Singapore fabulous local food. With the prime location, the refurbished rooms and our continued emphasis on service excellence, Hotel Royal strives to provide you “Every Room A Home” feeling.

Description: Nestled in downtown Singapore with inspiring views of the Singapore River surrounds, Marina Bay and the heritage enclave of Kampong Glam, Hotel Traveltine is a hidden gem. Hotel Traveltine is sited a stone’s throw from the MRT with easy access to the airport. It is surrounded by an eclectic mix of Asian neighbourhood shops and retail/commercial businesses and cultural landmarks including the majestic Sultan Mosque. The world-famous Singapore Sling at the Raffles Hotel is just a leisurely walk away, at the fringe of the historic civic district. An area rich in history and today, a modern thriving hub, its Beach Road address was built as a coastal road facing the Straits of Singapore. The name ‘Traveltine’ is derived from a play on ‘travertine’, a multi-patterned elegant natural rock commonly found in hot springs or limestone caves just below the earth’s surface. No two pieces are alike. Like the travertine stone feature wall in the lobby, a stay at Hotel Traveltine is layered with modern comforts, authentic experiences and unique memories. Settle down with a choice of 300 rooms, a rooftop pool with sweeping views, a fitness room and a cosy bistro serving homely Asian and popular international favourites. For the diehard workaholics, workstations are available in the lobby along with a slew of business services. For the peckish, vending machines with snacks and drinks are found on level 1. At Traveltine, we deliver a comfortable stay with thoughtfulness and attention.

Description: This six storey hotel is built in a conservation shophouse along South Bridge Road, Singapore. The hotel offers our guests with easy access to any part of the city and is conveniently next to Raffles Place, Singapore’s busiest business hub. The hotel is also within walking distance to the Singapore River, which is in turn connected to three characteristic quays – Boat Quay, Clarke Quay and Robertson Quay. At night, party lovers will be thrilled by the line-up of pubs and restaurants that lights up the river banks with their vivid colours. For those who prefer a quieter atmosphere, take a short stroll further up to One Fullerton where you can enjoy the breath-taking views of Singapore’s night sky while being accompanied by several iconic landmarks such as the Esplanade, Marina Bay Sands and the Singapore Flyer.

Description: Experience life like a local at Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong. Housed on the site of the former Joo Chiat Police Station, our boutique hotel is an interesting juxtaposition of modern architecture and a conservation building (former Joo Chiat Police Station), featuring a unique design inspired by the Peranakan culture, with everything from the art murals to the tiles in the 131 guestrooms paying homage to the neighbourhood. Unwind with a dip in the rooftop infinity pool overlooking the whole of Singapore's first heritage town as the sun slowly sets behind the Katong skyline. Amenities such as complimentary Wi-Fi, 24-hour fitness centre, self-service business centre and function room offer convenience for leisure and business travellers alike. Located in the former Joo Chiat Police Station is Baba Chews Bar and Eatery, our all-day neighbourhood café, serving up flavours from the Straits of Malacca and a line-up of quality coffee, tea and cocktails inspired by local flavours.

Description: Looking for a place to stay in Singapore? Then look no further than ibis budget Singapore Clarke Quay (formerly known as Fragrance Hotel - Riverside), a budget friendly hotel that brings the best of Singapore to your doorstep. The rooms offer a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease. ibis budget Singapore Clarke Quay features a 24 hour front desk, a rooftop terrace, and baggage storage. In addition, as a valued ibis budget Singapore Clarke Quay guest, you can enjoy a rooftop pool that is available on-site. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to paid private parking available on-site. Close to some of Singapore's most popular landmarks, such as Arab Street (1.2 mi) and Little India (1.3 mi), ibis budget Singapore Clarke Quay is a great destination for tourists. While in Singapore, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from ibis budget Singapore Clarke Quay, including LeVeL 33 (0.7 mi), CE LA VI Restaurant (1.0 mi), and Palm Beach Seafood Restaurant (0.5 mi). Plus, during your trip, don't forget to check out a lighthouse, such as Fort Canning Lighthouse. We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at ibis budget Singapore Clarke Quay as you experience everything Singapore has to offer.

Description: Holiday Inn Express Singapore Katong is the smart choice for savvy business and leisure travelers, offering a relaxed affordable and hassle free stay every time. Just a 15-minute drive from the world famous Changi Airport and Central Business District, the property is in close proximity to Singapore Expo, Changi Business Park and Singapore Sports Hub. The 451-room property is set to be the third and largest hotel of the brand in the country that offers our value-conscious guests the experience of an authentic ethnic culture of Singapore from a whole new part of the city. Hotel amenities include a self-service business centre, a meeting room, a laundry room, free and fast Wi-Fi, free Express Start Breakfast or a Grab & Go option. Guests will have a comfortable and restful sleep to end the busy day with high quality bedding and a choice of soft or firm pillows. There's also access to the fitness centre to indulge in a fitness regime any time.

Description: Value Hotel Nice is a low cost hotel concept offering the ideal combination of comfort and value to the savvy and cost-conscious traveller who wants to make the most out of each trip . Contemporary and tasteful interiors and locations easily accessible by public transportation make it a great choice for business or holiday .At Value Hotel Nice , we have made it our mission to cater to the needs of today’s travellers , with the overriding consideration to keep rates attractive. Within each room, guests will find the ubiquitous essential guest amenities/facilities, needed for a comfortable stay . WIFI internet (broadband) access is offered free to our guests . If you just need a comfortable room , Value Hotel Nice will be just be what you need , for a little less.Our colleagues will be most happy to share with you , what to do or eat whilst you are here . You may be pleasantly surprised at the myriad offerings along Balestier Road and the surrounding areas . Getting around is a breeze , as Singapore has an extensive and very reliable public transportation network which connects all parts of the country . Thus regardless if you are on business or leisure , let Value Hotel Nice be your hotel of choice.

Description: Located at the tranquil part of the iconic Singapore River in the quaint Robertson Quay, Four Points by Sheraton Singapore, Riverview is close to the CBD, Chinatown, the well-known shopping enclave of Orchard Road, popular entertainment and nightlife districts – Clarke Quay and Boat Quay and other attractions, such as Gardens by the Bay, Marina Bay and Singapore Botanic Gardens in Singapore. It is also within walking distance to Tiong Bahru, a heritage estate offering unique and contrasting new and old Singapore experiences. Featuring 476 modern and stylish guestrooms and suites with contemporary designs, you can enjoy magnificent panoramic city or river views. With an outdoor pool, all-day dining restaurant, two 24-hour fitness centres and complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the hotel, we have all the fundamental needs for your stay.

Description: did not expect much from this small guest house, with low rate. however it would be better if the furnitures and walls are well maintained and have servicing. the walls are dirty, the doors does not have double lock for safety, the aircon in the room i stayed at top level is noisy and old. service at the front office is average, not very interactive. the toothbrush kit provided has expired toothpaste. no fridge, no tv. if you are here in singapore to enjoy, this place is not really recommended until all of the above mentioned are improved, it feels like youre living in an old room. if youre just looking for a room and not expecting much, just to stay and sleep, sure this should be fine.

Description: Ascott Raffles Place Singapore is a paragon of cultured living set in the heart of Singapore's financial cityscape. The heritage building restored from its 1950 splendour, is a distinct and exclusive residential experience with its Art Deco architectural facade set against the modern cityscape. The prime location grants immediate access to the multitude of business and financial institutions in the CBD area. Also close are the renowned entertainment and shopping districts, international restaurants and cultural destinations unique to Singapore.Each of these serviced suites at Ascott Raffles Place Singapore is designed to articulate sheer luxury and ensure absolute peace of mind. Be lavished with unrivalled personalised services and extensive business support in the comfort and privacy of an elegant, fully-equipped home. With a commanding view of Singapore and designed for optimum luxury, Ascott Raffles Place Singapore provides the extravagant comfort, elegant suites and the supreme privacy desired in a luxurious serviced suite.

The cosy hotel offers affordable accommodation with a rooftop pool. ibis budget Singapore Selegie is a 15-minute walk from the popular Orchard Road. The hotel is also close to many cultural sites, including Sri Lakshmi Narayanan Temple and the National Museum. Simply decorated, rooms at ibis budget Singapore Selegie present a home away from home. Fitted with a flat-screen TV and tea/coffee making facilities, each room has a private bathroom with hot shower. The hotel’s rooftop swimming pool offers views of Singapore’s city skyline. The hotel provides laundry services and has a tour desk to assist guests with travel arrangements. Food and beverage is served at the hotel’s cafe located on the second level. In-room dining is available.

Description: Hi Hotel Bugis is the First Art Design and Smart Hotel centrally located in the Bugis area, 8 minutes’ walk from Bugis MRT and 6 minutes walk fromLavender MRT Stations. Only 15 Uniquelly Themeatic rooms are designed by global artists which offers air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor pool, and free WiFi. Brightly colored rooms are individually-designed featuring works from both local and international artists. Rooms are fitted with a flat-screen cable TV and a safety deposit box. En suite bathrooms include shower facilities and free toiletries. Some units offer a bathtub. Guests enjoy complimentary use of a handyphone equipped with free WiFi as well as local and selected international calls. XY Hotel Bugis Singapore is a few minute walk from shopping options at Bugis Street and Bugis Junction. Orchard Road is 3.5 km away, while Changi International Airport is a 30-minute drive away. The 24-hour front desk provides luggage storage and laundry or dry cleaning services.

Description: Mercure Singapore Tyrwhitt is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Singapore, offering many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay. Mercure Singapore Tyrwhitt offers guests an array of room amenities including a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available. The hotel offers a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and a rooftop terrace, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features a pool and an on-site restaurant. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking. Nearby landmarks such as Singapore Flyer (1.6 mi) and Orchard Road (1.7 mi) make Parc Sovereign Hotel - Tyrwhitt a great place to stay when visiting Singapore. Travelers looking to enjoy some ribs can head to Palm Beach Seafood Restaurant, Hong Kong Soya Sauce Chicken Rice & Noodle, or Hawker Chan. Otherwise, you may want to check out a Chinese restaurant such as Palm Beach Seafood Restaurant, JUMBO Seafood, or Hong Kong Soya Sauce Chicken Rice & Noodle. Best of all, Parc Sovereign Hotel - Tyrwhitt makes it easy to experience many great Singapore attractions like Chijmes, Emerald Hill, and Lau Pa Sat Festival Pavilion, which are some popular historic sites. Enjoy your stay in Singapore!

Description: Finding an ideal family-friendly hotel in Singapore does not have to be difficult. Welcome to ibis budget Singapore Imperial (formerly known as Fragrance Hotel - Imperial), a nice option for travelers like you. Close to some of Singapore's most popular landmarks, such as Singapore Flyer (1.4 mi) and Merlion Park (1.6 mi), ibis budget Singapore Imperial is a great destination for tourists. ibis budget Singapore Imperial is a family-friendly hotel offering a flat screen TV and air conditioning in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.
